title: New: Hundred Waters – Xtalk
content:
The new Hundred Waters album is shaping up to be one of the records of the year.

With the stunning Cavity and Down From The Rafters already heard, they’ve released Xtalk, another cut taken from the 12 track LP, The Moon Rang Like A Bell, out 27 May. Maintaining the elegance and composure of their debut LP, yet intertwining it with a bolder, potentially more anthemic sound, Xtalk is otherworldly good.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
